description:
Enjoy the smoky heat of authentic Al Pastor street tacos, when there are no streets in sight.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: white rice, pinto beans, freeze dried pulled pork (natural flavors, salt), pineapple, potato starch, red onion, garlic granulated, sea salt, crystalized lime (citric acid, lime oil, lime juice), natural flavor [contains baker’s yeast extract, salt, canola oil (anti-dusting)], cumin, natural vinegar flavor (maltodextrin, silicon dioxide, and natural flavor), green chile pepper, paprika, oregano, thyme, cilantro, natural pineapple flavor [(maltodextrin, silicon dioxide, natural flavor, and tricalcium phosphate)], monterey chili powder (chili pepper, spices, salt, garlic), black pepper, red pepper crushed, jalapeno, smoke powder (maltodextrin, natural mesquite smoke flavor, silicon dioxide to prevent caking)
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Al Pastor With Cilantro Lime Rice
